gate.plugin.learningframework.features

Class FeatureExtractionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.plugin.learningframework.features.FeatureExtractionBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureExtractionDense, FeatureExtractionMalletSparse

    public class FeatureExtractionBase
extends Object
    Base class for the FeatureExtraction classes. This mainly just defines common constants for now, the actual implementations work a bit differently since the use different representations for the instances.
    Author:
    Johann Petrak

    • Field Detail

      • TYPESEP

        public static final String TYPESEP
        Separates the type name inside the name from the feature name. The scheme is typenameÂ¦featurename where typename can be empty.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NAMESEP

        public static final String NAMESEP
        Separates the name from any additional information. Additional information is kind of attribute (Ngram, attributelist etc), things like the element number if it is an attributelist, or the value for nominal one-of-k coded features.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VALSEP

        public static final String VALSEP
        Separates the remainder of the feature name from the part that indicates the value for nominal one-of-k coded features.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NGRAMSEP

        public static final String NGRAMSEP
        Separates the grams in an n-gram with n < 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ELEMSEP

        public static final String ELEMSEP
        Separates the name of the feature from the element number, if we get the value for a numeric attribute which is a list or array of numeric values.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • featureName

        public static String featureName(FeatureSpecAttribute attr,
                                 int listEl)
        Convert a FeatureSpecAttribute instance to its internal feature name.
        Parameters:
        attr - attribute
        listEl - for a list attribute, the element number, otherwise ignored
        Returns:
        internal feature name

      • featureNamePrefix

        public static String featureNamePrefix(FeatureSpecAttribute attr)
        Convert a FeatureSpecAttribute to the feature name prefix. This generates the prefix up to and including the NAMESEP, but not including the actual indicator for the attribute type (A/N/L).
        Parameters:
        attr - the feature spec attribute instance
        Returns:
        feature name prefix string

      • featureSpecAttributes2FeatureNames

        public static List<String> featureSpecAttributes2FeatureNames(List<FeatureSpecAttribute> attrs)
        Convert a list of feature specifications to a list of internal feature names. This converts each of the FeatureSpecAttribute instances to its internal feature name. Since the annotation type part of the name should be blank if the name in the feature specification matches the name specified in the PR, this method also needs the annotation type.
        Parameters:
        attrs - list of feature specification attributes
        Returns:
        list of names

      • featureSpecAttributes2FeatureInfos

        public static List<Map<String,Object>> featureSpecAttributes2FeatureInfos(List<FeatureSpecAttribute> attrs)
        Create an info map for all named features. This creates, for every named feature, a map String to Object which contains the following entries: name: the name of the feature attrid: the id/index of the attribute kind: the "kind", one of N, A or L
        Parameters:
        attrs - list of feature spec attribute instance
        Returns:
        info map
